ingredients: 1 cup butter, softened, divided, 5 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa powder,   +   1/4 cup white sugar, 1  egg, beaten, 1   +   3/4 cups graham cracker crumbs, 1 cup flaked coconut,   +   1/2 cup finely chopped almonds (Optional), 3 tablespoons heavy cream, 2 tablespoons custard powder, 2 cups confectioners' sugar, 4 (1 ounce) squares semisweet baking chocolate, 2 teaspoons butter
nutrition: Total Fat 20g 25%, Saturated Fat 11g 56%, Cholesterol 47mg 16%, Sodium 160mg 7%, Total Carbohydrate 34g 12%, Dietary Fiber 2g 8%, Total Sugars 26g, Protein 3g, Calcium 19mg 1%, Iron 1mg 7%, Potassium 87mg 2%
